name: Twin Thunders
text: When you fight giants, your powerful blows combine with skills learned from generations of your people to quickly even the odds.
prerequisites: Dwarf or gnome, defensive training racial trait, Two-Weapon Fighting or flurry of blows class feature, Weapon Focus with both wielded weapons.
benefit: Once per round, when wielding a bludgeoning weapon in each hand against a creature with the giant subtype, if you hit the creature with your off-hand weapon after you hit with your primary weapon, roll the damage dice for your off-hand weapon twice and add the results together before adding any bonuses. Such extra weapon damage dice are not multiplied on a critical hit.
staminaText: You can spend 2 stamina points to gain the benef its of this feat against a creature at least one size category larger than you that does not have the giant subtype. You gain this benef it until the start of your next turn.
text_zh: 当你与巨人战斗时，你混合了先人智慧的有力重击效果拔群。
prerequisites_zh: 矮人或侏儒，【防御训练】种族特性，双武器格斗或【疾风连击】职业特性，武器专攻（当前持用的两种武器）。
benefit_zh: 每轮1次，当你两手各用一件钝击武器攻击具有巨人亚种的生物时，若你在主手武器命中后又以副手武器命中，副手武器的伤害可在应用加值前双骰累加。额外伤害不会因重击加倍。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗2点耐力来在对一个体型至少大你一级的非巨人亚种生物时获得这个专长的好处。在你下一回合开始之前你都能获得该好处。
